revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=SURFboard SBG6580 |revision= |upc=612572180402 |ean= |asin=B0040IUI46 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/18/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem,wireless router |fcc_id=W5HSBG6580 |ic_id=5117A-SBG6580 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3380;BCM3380GKFSBG, TN0931 P11; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12805DMI-20G |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR-S5C |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Broadcom BCM943224HMS |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43224;BCM43224KMLG, CA0937 P20, 936546 4; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115S;BCM53115SKFBG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=SBG6580XX, MOTOROLA-XXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^SBG6580[A-F0-9]{2}$,,, ^MOTOROLA-[A-F0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=motorola |oui=B0:77:AC, E4:83:99 |oui_eth=B0:77:AC, E4:83:99 }} [http://www.midcocomm.com/_files/files/SBG6580.pdf User guide] [http://www.isuppli.com/Teardowns/Pages/Motorola-SBG6580-DOCSIS-3-0-Cable-Modem-and-802-11n-Access-Point.aspx Teardowns ''Motorola SBG6580'' - BCM3380 modem IC],
though according to this the switch is BCM53115SKFBG
(it appears to be Broadcom BCM53125 from the FCC photos) "SBG6580 MAIN BOARD", "571511-001 REV: 2", "Otc-16-2009", and "MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The default SSID pattern appears to be '''SBG6580XX''' (where '''XX''' appears to be two hex digits, upper case letters)
or '''MOTOROLA-XXXXXX''' (where '''XXXXX''' is presumably the last three octets of the BSSID minus a character). :Wi-Fi 2T2R 2.4/5GHz switchable Presumed to use a 1C:14:48 OUI{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }} {{WiFiCert|WFA8246|12/23/2009}} ==P/Ns== *'''570761-001-00''', MOTOROLA-XXXXX SSID format, E4:83:99 OUI, Assembed in China, FCC ID: W5HSBG6580 *'''570763-006-00''', unknown SSID format, B0:77:AC OUI, Assembled in China, FCC ID: W5HSBG6580 *'''570761-007-00''', SBG6850XX SSID format, 2C:9E:5F OUI, Assembled in China, FCC ID: W5HSBG6580A *'''583315-006-00''', SBG6850XX SSID format, 94:CC:B9 OUI, Assembled in China, FCC ID: W5HSBG6580A ==Likely compatible services== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.comcast.net/device.php?devid=268 '''Comcast''' device database entry])
